arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Lorient: Maghnes Akliouche out, Ansu Fati starts
arts.sum: AS Monaco have a chance to go (temporarily) top of the table tonight when they travel north to the Stade du Moustoir to face newly promoted FC Lorient. Monaco comeâ€¦

It's been a disappointing start to the season for Lorient, who currently sit in 17th position in Ligue 1. They've picked up just one win from their opening five league games, failing to secure three p...
